summary: Just a simple White orc race.
descriptionHtml:
Simple white orc race for a mod I am developing, Should be compatible with nearly everything, adds White orcs as a player race.

For the screenshots results will be dependant on your body and character edit mods, I am using WSCO and that is what is shown in the images for my mod. WSCO is not required, enjoy!

If anyone has any other custom race mods that are not much more than skin and stat edits let me know and I'll work into it.
I am not a modeler, my mods will mostly be re-works, and re-used content from the game itself or using files I have gained permission of use from other modders.

Also keep an eye out for my next upcoming mods, a custom pre-furnished player home, and likely more races to play skyrim with.
author: Mad Pumpkin
